verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
My Lord what love is this
That pays so dearly
That I the guilty one
May go free

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Amazing love
O what sacrifice
The Son of God given for me
My debt He pays
And my death He dies
That I might live
That I might live

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And so they watched Him die
Despised rejected
But oh the blood He shed
Flowed for me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And now this love of Christ
Shall flow like rivers
Come wash your guilt away
Live again
